Phoenix Ocean Richards

Security Analyst | Automation Engineer
Security-Focused Software Developer

I build practical tools and solve real problems. My focus is on Automation, Web Development, Security, and Linux-based systems, with an emphasis on understanding how things work under the hood. I enjoy breaking down complex systems, identifying weaknesses, and building simple, effective solutions.

work experience personal projects contact me

about

I’m Phoenix, a developer and security enthusiast driven by a lifelong obsession with how systems work—and more importantly, how they break. From assembling my first PC at age 12 to later teaching myself to rebuild engines and transmissions, I’ve spent my life deconstructing complex machines to understand their inner logic.

My technical journey spans over eight years of hands-on experience with Linux, Networking, and Programming. While my professional background is diverse, my focus has remained constant: solving problems through code and curiosity. Whether I'm developing custom automation tools, building websites from scratch, or hardening systems, I thrive at the intersection of hardware and software. I am now dedicated to applying this mechanical mindset and technical foundation to a full-time career in cybersecurity and software engineering.

work experience

Full-Stack Web Developer

Confidential · Remote · 2023
  • Strengthened website security by enforcing HTTPS, implementing input validation and developing custom anti-bot protections for the Gmail API form.
  • Implemented SEO strategies that significantly boosted Google search rankings, increasing visibility and user traffic.
  • Lowered hosting and upkeep costs by 75% by optimizing computing resources and selecting more cost-effective service providers, directly improving company profitability.

  • Improved website accessibility and UX, making sites readable, navigable, and fully usable across all devices for all users, including those with disabilities.

Python Automation Developer | Healthcare Data Migration

Confidential · Remote · 2025
  • Engineered a custom end-to-end data migration pipeline in Python to transfer sensitive patient health information (PHI) between two incompatible systems.
  • Architected an automated web-based data extraction system using Selenium to retrieve data from a platform lacking API support or export functionality.
  • Implemented robust data normalization and validation scripts to transform unstructured source data into a standardized format, ensuring 100% data integrity across 1000's of records.
  • Automated the upload process, simulating manual entry at scale to overcome system limitations while maintaining strict adherence to HIPAA.
  • Reduced migration timeline significantly compared to manual entry projections, eliminating human error and ensuring a seamless transition for clinical staff.
Python Automation Data Integrity HIPAA Data Normalization ETL Selenium
